title: Unable to open discounted skin shop
body: Don't know why but in "your shop" on league, i can't open or look at any of the discounted skins that league is offering me. HELP?!?

replies.body: I've started to see a lot of issues with Your Shop not loading correctly. While we get these issues smoothed out, let's try refreshing your client to see if we can get those offers to load. If that doesn't work, let's try adjusting some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well to make sure you can get a solid connection with our servers.
Me to its a perma loading simbol... i cant even see my discoutts
